# Contaminated Soil Disposal RFP

## dg00130654499-001

* Reference Number: WS3839242435
* Solicitation Number: WS3839242435
* RFP Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Contract Type: Construction
* Category: Hazardous Waste Disposal
* Industries: Environmental Services

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the removal and disposal of two piles of contaminated soil from a site in Kentville, Nova Scotia. The project's objective is to ensure the safe and environmentally responsible disposal of hazardous waste.

## Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: February 9, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* RFP Release Date: January 24, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 10, 2023
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia
* Procurement Method: Competitive Procurement - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
